import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { title: 'Find Blood Donors', description: 'Quickly locate blood donors in your area with our advanced search system.', icon: '🔍', path: '/search' }, { title: 'Donate Blood', description: 'Register as a blood donor and help save lives in your community.', icon: '❤️', path: '/donate' }, { title: 'Emergency Response', description: '24/7 emergency blood request system for urgent medical needs.', icon: '🚨', path: '/search' }, { title: 'Track Donations', description: 'Keep track of your blood donation history and impact.', icon: '📊', path: '/donors' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '10,000+', label: 'Lives Saved' }, { number: '5,000+', label: 'Active Donors' }, { number: '100+', label: 'Cities Covered' }, { number: '24/7', label: 'Emergency Support' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Save Lives Through Blood Donation

Connect blood donors with those in need. Every drop counts, every donor matters.

Find Blood Donors Become a Donor
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Features Section */}

How We Help Save Lives

Our platform connects blood donors with patients in need, making the process simple and efficient.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Make a Difference?

Join thousands of donors who are saving lives every day. Your donation can make all the difference.

); }; export default Home;
